Multiple executions of files or processe.Action: Collect Windows Event ID 4688 (Process Creation) and Zeek file.log. Group processes by parent/child relationships and command-line structure. Correlate process creations with file hashes from Zeek. Identify instances where the same process name or command line is observed multiple times but associated file hashes change. Use correlation analysis to identify widespread occurrences or linkages.

Network connections exhibiting irregular.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log and http.log for connections to external IPs. Examine payload sizes, request patterns, and frequency for suspicious destinations. Use time series analysis and entropy measures on connection data or payload characteristics to identify changing or unpredictable network traffic patterns.
